locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Lots of spaces, and they have a  McDonalds on site. There is a large, clean store, and the restrooms were clean.

It is a smaller Pilot, but it is really clean and well organized. Easy to get into with our n√ºCamp travel trailer, clean lot, working pumps and card readers, clean restroom with goop-like hand cleanser, and several self checkout kiosks that were actually really easy to use. There‚Äôs a McDonalds attached.

I go to alot of Pilots but I have to say this is by far the most clean and well maintained Pilot I have been to and the staff is very friendly.
The staff takes really good care of this location if your from Pilot Corporate and reading this I just want you to know this location got it right.
Me and my friends went to the bathroom here and when we were leaving the employees yelled at us not to piss in the trash can. I don‚Äôt know who is peeing in your trash can but it isn‚Äôt us
Thanks, staff! Great job. This place is always clean inside and out and always friendly big thanks to the management team for picking the right employees.

Nocatee / Ponte Vedra area.  I don‚Äôt know about you, but I like a clean, private bathroom with plenty of stalls, and pilot seems to have these cross the states.  Also, the gas is less expensive then even gas stations across the street.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Malena Ma Lane Ya Taylor_Nocatee_/_Ponte_Vedra_area._I_don‚Äôt_know_about_yo_4 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Did not see a Popeyes.  Prices are way too high for the  truck drivers.  Parking  for four wheelers. Drivers  showers

showerReviews.reviewText: Right here it‚Äôs a not real TA. Look here shower room. Super clean and new. The most clean TA shower rooms ever. The driver will got nice morning and one night right here . Two minutes walk Dunkin and McDonald . Thanks Lawrence nice clean job üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶
Good spot for a break in your travels... Got choices for food, good hot coffee, clean restrooms, ev charging and more... Knock off one star for high prices and having to pay for wifi, ridiculous!

The cashier was really welcoming and attentive. As a truck driver, I rely on TA for their services. I love a good truck stop, and the one with a fitness center upstairs is clean and well taken care of. The cleaning staff is very attentive; ‚Ä¶

I came on 02.29.25 at 12.10 pm to get a shower. Tried to book it through the TA app but the app gave me an error and took my shower credit. I went to the fuel desk and Jasmine refused to give me a shower, knowing they had a problem with the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ me and then no problem soon an 1hour and 30min after they pull me in the bay get me out of my truck I went to shower next thing they say mechanic have to roll on road call but what about my truck. I was heading to shower but seen that ask ‚Ä¶
Diesel.  food and shower

‚Ä¶ , snacks beer ect. Store also has certain things for truck drivers. The showers are nice and clean but a bit pricey at 17.00 dollars. Florida is even more expensive 18.00 to 19.50 for a shower, apparently Florida has a tax on showers üöø ‚Ä¶
Great shower space . Not enough towels

The showers are nice to look at, but as a trucker, I need a good shower head with water pressure and you had neither. The sink doesn't have enough pressure to clean out my razor. Money spent on all the wrong things.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: had a great experience. parking doesn't fill up too fast, tons of spots when i got here at around noon. showers were about what you'd expect, clean and well maintained. only issue i had was pump #19 didn't want to work on the app or when i put my card in so i had to go all the way around to try pump #21, which worked.
Brand new Love's. Clean, convenient, priced competitively, easy on/off from the interstate 1 block down. Even has a Hardee's, pet relief area, and waste water pump out station. Highly recommend.

Great customer service and clean facilities. Love stopping here on long trips. We have several children and  safety and cleanliness is always our top priority when deciding to stop.  We have never been disappointed at Love's. 10 of 10 would definitely recommend.
Stopped at Loves across the country. They were all clean, had at least one restaurant inside. Gas pumps were quick, busy inside but did not have to wait long at the register.  Would recommend Loves.
Nice and clean place, but No trailer drop policy INFORCED. This was our 1st time parking there and out trailer got towed. :( No warning just gone.

This Love's has a great feature, having a dog park for the travelers with pets! The dog park was clean and has a separate area for small and big dogs. They provide a poop station (w poop bag and trash can). A water spigot with a dog bowl ‚Ä¶

New Love offers showers, laundry rooms, restrooms, and semi-truck parking. There's a Hardee's inside, with incredibly friendly staff who prepare fresh food. The Love's staff is also very nice and welcoming. I really appreciate how clean and new the truck parking area is, and I hope truckers will help maintain it that way.

Wow! Spotless showers, and kind customer service!
Also shoutout to the truck service/parts team! With Kris and other wonderful mechanic, we were taken care of and good to go safely back on the road. Thank you so much!! You guys are the best!!

showerReviews.reviewText: Shane went the extra mile for me when I thought I left my cell phone there. He was very professional and helpful, so in addition to the place being super clean and new- looking, it was a nice, friendly experience.

I've only been here a handful of times and they are always fully stocked. Cashiers are friendly and  I get amazing customer service. Bathrooms were very clean, as well. The cashier I've seen those few times was Shane. He helped me decide on ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Totally clean showers the people here will help you out no matter what the center is located outside the town so it's very clean and the staff is very friendly and they'll accommodate you whenever you need something. Pilot Travel Centers ‚Ä¶

Happened to be on the road and needed a shower. Quick and fast service. The young lady opened my door, clean and sanitary. Towel and wash rag provided, I carry my own so I didn‚Äôt use the provided items. When I say hot water, expect it! It ‚Ä¶

Fuel pumps not working with cards, they charge to park, they don't accept shower credits from pilot points, but the showers are closed and don't have towels anyway. The store is fairly clean and the cashier's are friendly though. Wouldn't ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Afternoon. I‚Äôm a lady trucker. My husband and I team drivers. Looking for over night parking and showers. This ‚Äúthing‚Äù that was working tonight was very rude. Told us if we were looking to shower she will have to charge us for two. We asked ‚Ä¶
Good to see remodel and new parking. But staff sucks. Was in shower total 20 minutes. 5 of that was waiting on hot water. Then staff comes knocking to rush you out! Says others are waiting. ‚Ä¶

On 10/13/2024 at approximately between 2:30 pm- 3:00pm . I walk in requesting to use my pilot points to take a shower . The three ladies that were at the front stated that we do not give out showers to truckers . The reason was because the ‚Ä¶

Very nice people there! My husband, 10 month old daughter, and I stopped by to shower on our way back to Pittsburgh after thanksgiving down there with my dad. We only paid 12$ to shower, it was amazing clean, and the ladies in the front ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ were covered in diesel so I guess everybody has to come in and was thinking hands. I can't believe they expect truckers to shower in that filth and pay for it. I do want to like pilots and flying J and we did have a great experience in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for every fraction of a penny.  That kind of business doesn't encourage a return visit.  Based on previous reviews, I'm glad I didn't try to shower here.  To management, if you don't disinfect, shower shoes or not, we get nasty foot fungi ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that the place is in.. make sure you bring some kind of disinfectant and plenty of paper towels to wipe the showers down with because they are absolutely disgusting and they are using dirty water just to run a mop through things they are ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Most important for me tonight, the shower/bathroom was spotlessly clean; big deal for a trucker away from home. ‚Ä¶

Don't stop here if you like being stuck in the driveway for 20minutes. The water in the shower is back and fourth warm for a couple minutes then cold for way longer. Hardly any parking just pass this place up unless you are actually out of ‚Ä¶

I always get up two hrs before my break is up to shower and get ready but I spent and hours waiting for a shower from 2 am to 4 am now I'm late to my appointment they had opened dirty showers and no one care to clean them up ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ thank you ‚Ä¶

As a full time on the road traveler, what a wonderful shower. $12, all in one private toilet, sink, and large shower. Not a lot of room in terms of the "dry space" but managed just fine. Doesn't lower my rating. Oddly didn't earn any ‚Ä¶
Clean shower ,laundry, mcdonald's on site,clean not to big,so far the nicest truck stop,although I'm cargo van driver,not semi truck
Stopped here for a hot shower and this Pilot did not disappoint. Hot water and ready quick. Staff were friendly and helpful. Recommend.

‚Ä¶ a ProPhil pilot flying J cup. He followed my husband around the store like he was a criminal. He refused to give us an extra towel for our shower. I shower with my husband when Im on the road with him. We will not be returning to this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ affect until 4 PM the next day. Went into the shower in the morning , my company is calling saying wesley the manager is calling saying I wasn't  on the property and he was threatening to tow my truck. I was going to pay for the next ‚Ä¶
Friendly staff, CLEAN showers! $12 for a shower. A washcloth, small, and large towel are provided. All in one soap is also provided inside the shower. Would visit again.
Cleanest truckers shower I have been in. Would give them 5 stars if there was more tractor trailer parking.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ behind the counter who didnt want to do her job we got it all squared away. The service here from the older gentleman working in the shower area is by far best ive had. I wish i had all good stuff to say but i still hands down give 5 stars ‚Ä¶

Need to repair the lights over the sinks in shower rooms. Repair stall doors in mens bathroom. Repair lot night lighting. Place needs basic maintenance. Be nice if they would put in a Iron Skillet. Needs a restaurant that serves breakfast.. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was open and dinner was good. Everyone was friendly and very helpful. The next morning we fueled and showered. Showers were some of the nicest and cleanest I've ever been in (4 years on the road). My wife's first truck stop shower and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ truck/travel stop. Everyone in here is always really friendly and helpful. The store is clean and the bathrooms/shower rooms are very clean. There are always some sort of decorations put up in the women's restrooms at least. One time I went ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ However, due to their recent increase in shower prices (Now $14!) and a new policy that doesn't allow the shop to give you shower credits, even when you are having thousands of dollars of work done, I'm only giving Petro/TA 3 stars from now ‚Ä¶
Nice shower attendant left Christmas cards, very clean showers, Has a Popeyes. Plenty of parking day and night, most of the parking is blindsided unless you pull through.

Shout out to Thomas the shower guy he has the best attitude and is always willing to help no matter what. Every time I have stoped for a shower here and he is working you can be sure he will see you and go out of his way to greet you.
Average truck stop.  Thanks to me I put a stop to the gay guy touching men's shoulders on way to shower.   I had the regional manager involved.   Other than that it's ok

Shower attendant, Thomas Hinton, has to be the nicest employee you have.  He is very thoughtful of the drivers and was an absolute pleasure to interact with!!
Thank you Thomas! üòÅ ‚Ä¶

It's the best truck stop pair in the business.

I love the place, for the peaceful environment they have, quick and accurate service, friendly people, clean shower and of course good food too.
